modName: Mraaj Dar The Cheydinhal Sanctuary Merchant
summary:
M'raaj-Dar fron TES4 Oblivion is now in Skyrim!
As a merchant once again
descriptionHtml:
We all remember M'raaj-Dar right? He's that orange khajiit merchant who stays with the Dark Brotherhood wjo was killed during the Purification. You can find him in the Bannered Mare where he'll be selling his spells (the ones from Oblivion) No weapons from Oblivion included. M'raaj-Dar is marked as essential, so don't worry if you shot his face, he'll forgive you

M'raaj-Dar will sell

Baronoff's Bloody Icicle
Deathly Visage
Void Gazer
Black Winter
Will of Sithis
Night Mother's Caress
And a random piece of armor or a random weapon (you won't get the Wabbajack cuz that's not happening)

Known Bugs

1.M'raaj-Dar is suposed to be orange, but his head is white
2.M'raaj-Dar will always have his fists up unless you somehow make him your follower.What you should do next is very obvious.

I'm still very new to modding, so I often leave bugs like these.
If you know how to fix these bugs then please tell me
author: DiscordLol
